name: Sonic
description: Who wants a HOTDOG? Sonic does! The most memeable token in the Ethereum Network, combines the power of MEMES with the taste of FOODS to create the new trend in crypto space. HOTDOG has a circulating supply of 25,000,000 and a 3% tax on every transaction. Team tends to create NFT for its holders while also to release a play2earn web3 game to increase people awareness. Sonic (HOTDOG) was launched on August 2023 and currently has a strong community and supporters while its conract is Audited, Contract Renounced and liquidity locked. If you want to join the project just make sure you follow it in their social media and share your opinion and your thoughts to the team.
